description: Shade-grown tea leaves processed for roasted tea powder. Delivers roasted, sweet, mellow flavors with distinctive nutty notes.
name: Tencha

description: Japan's most widespread cultivar, accounting for ~75% of production. Known for its balanced, reliable flavor profile with grassy notes and versatile character.
name: Yabukita

description: Early harvest cultivar with rich umami taste, mild sweetness, and vibrant clear green appearance. Known for its well-rounded flavor profile and smooth texture.
name: Saemidori

description: One of Japan's deepest and most robust cultivars with adventurous character. Features roasted chocolate, oceanic minerality, and bold complexity.
name: Gokou

description: Renowned premium Uji cultivar with deep umami flavor and noble heritage. Full-bodied, mellow, rich and creamy with distinctive nutty notes.
name: Samidori

description: Harmoniously blended cultivars creating balanced flavor, aroma, and color. Rich but mellow, smooth but layered - perfect for everyday drinking.
name: Multi-Cultivar Blend

description: Ultimate purity and sophistication from Uji. Zero astringency with rich creamy body, flavors of cashew butter, and silky smooth finish.
name: Ujihikari

description: Premium cultivar with rich umami and sophisticated flavor depth. Features mellow aroma with rose and chocolate hints, distinctive quality.
name: Okumidori
